item.title: [HTB] Machine: Bank

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Mirai
item.description: Mirai Enumeration nmap all ports └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.48 -T5 Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-06-06 21:32 BST Warning: 10.10.10.48 giving up on port because retransmission cap hit (2). Stats: 0:12:02 elapsed; 0 hosts completed (1 up), 1 undergoing Connect Scan Connect Scan Timing: About 85.56% done; ETC: 21:46 (0:02:02 remaining) Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.48 (10.10.10.48) Host is up (0.17s latency). Not shown: 64338 closed tcp ports (conn-refused), 1191 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 53/tcp open domain 80/tcp open http 1331/tcp open intersan 32400/tcp open plex 32469/tcp open unknown Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 800.
